item.title: Terraform Scripting Concepts: Part 1 of 2
item.description: Create infrastructure provisioning scripts using Terraform (part 1 or 2). Explore key concepts: CLI installation, running scripts, script structure, variables

item.title: Terraform Scripting Concepts: Part 2 of 2
item.description: Create infrastructure provisioning scripts using Terraform (part 2 or 2). Explore key concepts: functions, providers, resources

item.title: BashLib64 Project
item.description: Bash functions for facilitating and accelerating development of scripts and code snippets

item.title: Bash Scripting Concepts: Part 1 of 2
item.description: Create automation scripts using Bash (part 1 of 2). Explore key concepts: Bash overview, script structure, variables, processes, functions

item.title: Bash Scripting Concepts: Part 2 of 2
item.description: Create automation scripts using Bash (part 2 of 2). Explore key concepts: loops, conditionals, redirection.

item.title: Container64 Project
item.description: OCI compliant container images that can be used for testing infrastructure management tools

item.description: Automated infrastructure-as-code management solution based on Ansible for small to medium computing environments

item.description: Manage compute nodes using the infrastructure-as-code concept using Ansible and GIT

item.title: Ansible Concepts
item.description: What is Ansible? Explore main concepts, identify key components, understand content structure and organization, compare to traditional shell scripting
